title: (x) Special ID Cassanova black serif type - ITC Serif Gothic (customised) {Jan E}
content:
Hello!!!

do anyone know waht is this font?  
i´m getting crazy trying to find it

Thanks!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080113203204im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_5319.jpg)

 [‹ (x) flict sans - similar to House Chalet {Patricia}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080113203204/http:/typophile.com/node/38097 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Seemingly simple sans - FF Advert {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080113203204/http:/typophile.com/node/38094 "Go to next forum topic")
author: coto

comments.content:
I think this a customised ITC Serif Gothic (thick strocke added).  
If it is a font it’s probably not available.

It’s non-format, right? Had this before:

[http://typophile.com/node/37553](http://web.archive.org/web/20080113203204/http:/typophile.com/node/37553 "http://typophile.com/node/37553")
WOW that typeface could have been customized a thousand times better than this.

Take an idea and work it to death.

Are we going to see many more of these? I’m bored already.

Nick Cooke

yeah!!!

I’m going to customize ITC Serif Gothic in my way... But I need to customize the serif too...

Thanks... Jan, patricking and Nick
